page.title: 04TRAFFIC CENSUS (explanation)
page.content: This traffic census was designed to be simple and yet able to give an over-all view of vehicle movement and vehicle type on the three main trunk roads in our area:- (1){A50}to Northampton. (2){A426}to Lutterworth & Rugby. (3){A46}to Coventry but the main route to the{M1, M69}&{M6}motorways. The children divided the vehicles into just 3 categories:- (a){Private Transport}privately owned cars, cycles and motor cycles. (b){Commercial Transport}vans & lorries with a name or logo of a firm on them, used for carrying goods. (c){Public Transport}buses, coaches, taxis & ambulances. The census was done on a Tuesday between 9.30 and 10.30am and traffic flow was counted both towards and away from the city centre.
